pkgmetadata.longdescription: # YotpyAn easy-to-use Python wrapper for the Yotpo API. Developed to fill the gap of existing packages that didn't meet specific needs.## InstallationInstall `yotpy` using pip:```bashpip install yotpy```## DocumentationThe current documentation is updated on every update to main and can be found [here](https://wlk-dev.github.io/yotpy/yotpy.html).
